## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                | Type     | Default |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------------ | -------- | ------- |
| `diameter`    | `diameter`     | The spinner's size.                        | `number` | `24`    |
| `strokeWidth` | `stroke-width` | The stroke width of the spinner in pixels. | `number` | `2`     |
